Name: DMALocker
Comment:
no extension change
Encrypted files have prefix:
Version 1: ABCXYZ11
Version 2: !DMALOCK
Version 3: !DMALOCK3.0
Version 4: !DMALOCK4.0

AES(256) in ECB mode, 
Version 2-4 also RSA
